Class DistributionCenter

java.lang.Object
DistributionCenter
public class DistributionCenter extends Object
A class representing the distribution center, capable of distributing the newly added aids.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DistributionCenter()
    No-arg constructor
    DistributionCenter(File donorFile, File ngoFile, File distributedFile)
    Constructs a DistributionCenter object with the all the files as its data fields, so that it can be used to updating the database.

    • DistributionCenter

      public DistributionCenter()
      No-arg constructor

    • DistributionCenter

      public DistributionCenter(File donorFile, File ngoFile, File distributedFile)
      Constructs a DistributionCenter object with the all the files as its data fields, so that it can be used to updating the database.
      Parameters:
      donorFile - the file object of the file that contains all the available donations
      ngoFile - the file object of the file that contains all the incomplete requests
      distributedFile - the file object of the file that contains all the distributed aids

    • updateSupplies

      public void updateSupplies(ArrayList<Aid> aidsList, Aid aid, boolean isNGO)
      Takes in a newly added aid, goes through the database to see if there are corresponding aids to complete a distribution
      Parameters:
      aidsList - the list in which the newly added aid is located at
      aid - the newly added aid
      isNGO - the aid is an NGO request or donor donation

    • getSearchAidsList

      public ArrayList<Aid> getSearchAidsList(boolean isNGO, int index)
      Returns the aidslist of the index-th account in SearchList
      Parameters:
      isNGO - the aid is an NGO request or donor donation
      index - the index of the account
      Returns:
      the aidlist to be searched through for distribution of the newly added aid

    • getSearchListSize

      public int getSearchListSize(boolean isNGO)
      Returns the size of the searchList
      Parameters:
      isNGO - the aid is an NGO request or donor donation
      Returns:
      the size of the arraylist that has to be searched through for distribution of the newly added aid

    • changeSearchListAidQuantity

      public void changeSearchListAidQuantity(boolean isNGO, int account, int aidIndex, int newQuantity)
      Changes the quantity of the aidIndex-th Aid in the aidsList of the account-th Account in the SearchList
      Parameters:
      isNGO - the aid is an NGO request or donor donation
      account - the index of the account
      aidIndex - the index of the aid in the account's aidslist
      newQuantity - the new quantity of the the aid

    • removeAidFromSearchAidsList

      public void removeAidFromSearchAidsList(boolean isNGO, int account, int aidIndex)
      Removes the aidIndex-th Aid from its aidsList in the SearchList
      Parameters:
      isNGO - the aid is an NGO request or donor donation
      account - the index of the account
      aidIndex - the index of the aid in the account's aidslist
